problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, E is the midpoint of AD, and the perimeter of △DEF is N_0, then the perimeter of △BCF is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵在平行四边形ABCD中,E为AD的中点,△DEF的周长为1,∴AD=BC,AD∥BC,DE=\frac{1}{2}AD,∴△DFE∽△BCF,∴\frac{C_{\bigtriangleupDFE}}{C_{\bigtriangleupBFC}}=\frac{DE}{BC}=\frac{1}{2},∴C~△BCF~=2C~△BFE~=2,故选:B．
